mapper.select: SELECT U.ID, U.USER_ID AS USERID, U.USER_NAME AS USERNAME, U.USER_PASSWORD AS USERPASSWORD, U.JOB AS JOB, U.MGR_ID AS MGRID, U.ORG_ID AS ORGID, U.HTTP_USERFACE AS HTTPUSERFACE, O.ORG_NAME AS ORGNAME, O.ORG_LOC AS ORGLOC, O.PID AS PID FROM LIUZHICHAO_USER U LEFT JOIN LIUZHICHAO_ORG O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID

SELECT ID, USER_ID AS USERID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, USER_PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, JOB AS JOB, MGR_ID AS MGRID, ORG_ID AS ORGID, USERFACE AS USERFACE, HTTP_USERFACE AS HTTPUSERFACE FROM LIUZHICHAO_USER WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT U.ID, U.USER_ID AS USERID, U.USER_NAME AS USERNAME, U.USER_PASSWORD AS USERPASSWORD, U.JOB AS JOB, U.MGR_ID AS MGRID, U.ORG_ID AS ORGID, O.ORG_NAME AS ORGNAME, O.ORG_LOC AS ORGLOC, O.PID AS PID FROM LIUZHICHAO_USER U LEFT JOIN LIUZHICHAO_ORG O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID WHERE U.USER_NAME LIKE #{userNames}

SELECT U.ID, U.USER_ID AS USERID, U.USER_NAME AS USERNAME, U.USER_PASSWORD AS USERPASSWORD, U.JOB AS JOB, U.MGR_ID AS MGRID, U.ORG_ID AS ORGID, O.ORG_NAME AS ORGNAME, O.ORG_LOC AS ORGLOC, O.PID AS PID FROM LIUZHICHAO_USER U LEFT JOIN LIUZHICHAO_ORG O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID WHERE U.USER_NAME = #{userName}

SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_password, u.job, u.mgr_id, u.org_id, u.new_password, u.OLD_PASSWORD, u.USERFACE, u.HTTP_USERFACE, r.id, r.NAME, r.nameZH FROM liuzhichao_user u LEFT JOIN liuzhichao_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.uid LEFT JOIN liuzhichao_role r ON r.id = ur.rid WHERE u.user_name = #{userName}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIUZHICHAO_USER WHERE USER_NAME LIKE #{userName}
